Text.Text: Greetings, traveler... I'm called Pairi!  Moon *above,* your ears... they're just like mine!  Oooh, and your eyes... they're so beautiful...
Greetings, traveler... I'm called Pairi!  Moon *above,* your ears... they're just like mine!
Oh... well, a *very* long time ago, a villager found a strange child alone in the wilderness - that little girl, you see, was Pairi - me!  Suoma the Elder raised me as a daughter, and so here I am...

Mmm... I've had so much to do that I don't know much of what's going on - you should speak to Suoma the Elder, not me.  Or Tahvo, perhaps... he's in charge of all the hunters, and knows many things about the area.

Ah - I'm blushing!  Your words are as fair to hear as you are to look upon, kind traveler.  I know you'll leave soon, but when your journey finally over, would you come back and visit me?  I'd enjoy speaking with you again...
Ah!  I'm so happy!  You know, I sensed something the moment I saw you.  There's magic in my blood, in my heart - *sorcery. * That must be what's drawn me to you...

Wait!  I must ask... there is magic - sorcery - coursing through my blood.  It tells me the same of you, though you're much more powerful.  No one here can teach me, but I don't wish to leave the village just yet.  Can you help me?
Ah, wonderful!  I thank you, traveler.
Ah, the fair-eyed traveler!  It pleases me to see you again...
Ah, you're still here!  I'm pleased that you haven't left yet...
Ah!  My thanks... you're sweet to say such wonderful things to me...
You've led monsters to the village - please, kill them before they hurt someone!

Oh... I'm not allowed there.  But... I do know of one hidden path that leads a little ways in!  There's a narrow clearing with a stump - from there, go north, east, and east again.  That will lead you somewhere new!

Mmm-mmm, but... oh, perhaps!  Some men passed by recently; they claimed to be explorers but looked like bandits.  They entered the Fell Wood to the east... and never returned!  The angry ghost appeared shortly afterwards.
You have beautiful eyes too, Pairi.
That's true.  You seem different from the other villagers, Pairi.
Yes, they are.  I had some questions.
You seem different from the other villagers.  Why is that?
Would you be offended I told you how beautiful you are?
Would you be offended I told you how beautiful you are?
You seem different from the other villagers.  Why is that?
Do you know anything of the woman who lives in the eastern wilderness?
Do you know anything of the ghost haunting the western hunting grounds?
A drinking horn was stolen from the nearby barrow.  Do you know anything about that?
Do you know the way through the eastern woods?
What can you tell me about this area?
Suoma must have done well - you're a lovely woman.
Suoma must have done well - you're a lovely woman.
I could... but I'd hate to leave the splendor of your fair company.
I could... but I'd hate to leave the splendor of your fair company.
You seem different from the other villagers... why is that?
I don't think I'll be able to return.
Yes... I'll come back to see you.
I'll come back for you, Pairi, and will think of you often while away.
You seem different from the other villagers.
You seem different from the other villagers.
You seem different from the other villagers.
I'm not skilled enough... perhaps later, when I've learned more.
Training?  All I can offer you is a few suggestions.
We'll speak of this later, Pairi.  Farewell.
You seem different from the other villagers.
All right.  First of all, you'll want to...
It was an honor to aid so lovely a woman, Pairi.
It was an honor to aid so lovely a woman, Pairi.
You seem different from the other villagers... why is that?
Not nearly as much as it pleases me, beautiful Pairi.
You seem different from the other villagers... why is that?
I was only passing by, Pairi.  Farewell.
I was only passing by, Pairi.  Farewell.
I was only passing by, Pairi.  Farewell.
Upon seeing you, lovely Pairi, I'm pleased as well.
You seem different from the other villagers.
I was only passing by, Pairi.  Farewell.
I was only passing by, Pairi.  Farewell.
I was only passing by, Pairi.  Farewell.
You seem different from the other villagers.
I was only passing by.  Farewell.
I was only passing by.  Farewell.
I was only passing by.  Farewell.
You seem different from the other villagers.  Why is that?
